title: Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021) (as adapted by the Culture,
heading: 1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla (Leasú), 2021
text_raw:
1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla (Leasú), 2021 

(Tosach Feidhme), 2022 a ghairm den Ordú seo.
text_norm: 1 feadfar tordu um acht na dteangacha oifigiula (leasu) 2021 (tosach feidhme) 2022 ghairm den ordu seo

title: Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021) (as adapted by the Culture,
heading: 2. Ceaptar an 20ú lá de Mheitheamh, 2022 mar an lá a thiocfaidh na
text_raw:
2. Ceaptar an 20ú lá de Mheitheamh, 2022 mar an lá a thiocfaidh na 
forálacha seo a leanas d’Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla (Leasú), 2021 (Uimh. 49 
de 2021) i ngníomh: 

(a) 

alt 1; 

(b) 

alt 2 (seachas míreanna (a) agus (b)); 

(c) 

alt 8; 

(d) 

alt 20. 

ARNA THABHAIRT faoi mo Shéala Oifigiúil, 

20 Meitheamh, 2022. 

CATHERINE MARTIN, 

Aire Turasóireachta, Cultúir, Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, Spóirt 

agus Meán. 

Foilsíodh fógra san “Iris Oifigiúil” an 1 Iúil, 2022, á rá go ndearnadh an 
Ionstraim Reachtúil seo. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

[313] 3 

STATUTORY INSTRUMENTS. 

S.I. No. 313 of 2022 

________________ 

OFFICIAL LANGUAGES (AMENDMENT) ACT 2021 
(COMMENCEMENT) ORDER 2022 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [313] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

S.I. No. 313 of 2022 

OFFICIAL LANGUAGES (AMENDMENT) ACT 2021 
(COMMENCEMENT) ORDER 2022 

I, Catherine Martin, Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media, in exercise of the powers conferred on me section 20(3) of the Official 
Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021) (as adapted by the Culture, 
Heritage and the Gaeltacht (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of 
Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)), hereby order as follows:
text_norm: 2 ceaptar 20u la de mheitheamh 2022 mar la thiocfaidh na foralacha seo leanas acht na dteangacha oifigiula (leasu) 2021 (uimh 49 de 2021) ngniomh (a) alt 1 (b) alt 2 (seachas mireanna (a) agus (b)) (c) alt 8 (d) alt 20 arna thabhairt faoi mo sheala oifigiuil 20 meitheamh 2022 catherine martin aire turasoireachta cultuir ealaion gaeltachta spoirt agus mean foilsiodh fogra san iris oifigiuil 1 iuil 2022 ra go ndearnadh ionstraim reachtuil seo official translation tiontu oifigiuil 313 3 statutory instrument s.i no 313 2022 official language (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2022 4 313 official translation tiontu oifigiuil s.i no 313 2022 official language (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2022 catherine martin minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium exercise power conferred section 20(3) official language (amendment) act 2021 (no 49 2021) (as adapted culture heritage gaeltacht (alteration name department title minister) order 2020 (s.i no 403 2020)) hereby order follows

title: Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021) (as adapted by the Culture,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Official Languages (Amendment) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 

2021 (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited official language (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2022

title: Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021) (as adapted by the Culture,
heading: 2. The 20th day of June 2022 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 20th day of June 2022 is appointed as the day on which the following 
provisions of the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021) 
shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 1; 

(b) 

section 2 (other than paragraphs (a) and (b)); 

(c) 

section 8; 

(d) 

section 20. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 June, 2022. 

CATHERINE MARTIN, 

Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 

Media. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st July, 2022 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [313] 5
